title: Valid JWT Authentication with All Roles
description: Verify that users with valid JWT tokens and roles ADMIN, INVESTIGATOR, and COMMUNITY can successfully authenticate and access the system according to their permissions.

steps.description: Generate valid JWT tokens for ADMIN, INVESTIGATOR, and COMMUNITY roles.
Attempt to authenticate using each token.
Check that authentication is successful for each role and access rights correspond to their role.

title: JWT Authentication with Expired or Invalid Token
description: Ensure the system denies access when users present expired, malformed, or tampered JWT tokens.

steps.description: Attempt to authenticate with an expired JWT token.
Verify that authentication fails with appropriate error message.
Attempt to authenticate with a corrupted/malformed JWT token.
Verify that authentication fails with appropriate error message.

title: Admin CRUD Management of Projects
description: Verify completeness of CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on projects by users with ADMIN role including status transitions, collaborator assignments, and metadata updates.

steps.description: Log in as ADMIN.
Create a new project with all required fields and initial status.
Validate project is created correctly with stored metadata.
Retrieve the created project and verify data consistency.
Update the project details (name, description, status).
Verify that the project updates are persisted.
Assign and update collaborators with various roles.
Check collaborators are correctly linked with proper roles and ordering.
Delete the project.
Confirm that the project is removed from the database.

title: Investigator Project and Product Collaboration
description: Validate that users with INVESTIGATOR role can create, update, and collaborate on projects and scientific products as permitted.

steps.description: Authenticate as INVESTIGATOR.
Create a new project and add collaborators.
Verify that project creation is successful and collaborators are assigned.
Create a scientific product related to the project with categories, authorship, and attachments.
Confirm successful creation and metadata correctness.
Update the product categories and author order.
Check that updates persist and reflect accurately.
Delete a product and verify permissions block unauthorized deletions.
Ensure deletion succeeds only if permitted.

title: Community Role Access and Restrictions
description: Confirm that COMMUNITY role users have read-only or limited access and cannot perform unauthorized mutations.

steps.description: Authenticate as COMMUNITY user.
Attempt to create or update projects or products.
Verify that the system blocks unauthorized write operations.
Attempt to view projects, products, and users.
Verify that user can access allowed read-only data.

title: File Upload and Retrieval with Cloudflare R2
description: Test upload, storage, and retrieval of multiple file formats (docs, images, pdfs) for project and product attachments using Cloudflare R2 Storage.

steps.description: Upload various file types via admin panel and API endpoints.
Validate files are correctly stored and accessible from Cloudflare R2.
Download files and verify integrity and proper metadata.
Confirm files are intact and accessible in supported formats.
Test uploading an unsupported file type or exceeding size limit.
Verify the system properly rejects invalid uploads with clear errors.

title: Administrative Management of Users and Roles
description: Ensure ADMIN users can create, update, assign roles, revoke access, and delete users through the admin panel and API.

steps.description: Login as ADMIN.
Create new users with roles ADMIN, INVESTIGATOR, and COMMUNITY.
Verify users are persisted with correct roles.
Update user roles, profiles, and access rights.
Confirm that changes are correctly reflected in the system.
Revoke user access and attempt login.
Ensure revoked users cannot authenticate.
Delete a user account.
Confirm deletion and removal of all associated data.

title: Management and Prioritization of Action Lines
description: Verify CRUD operations and prioritization for departmental action lines and their association to projects.

steps.description: As ADMIN, create new action lines with priorities.
Check that action lines are stored with correct priority and metadata.
Associate action lines with existing projects.
Verify correct linkage between projects and action lines.
Update priorities and metadata of action lines.
Validate updates reflect appropriately in associated projects.
Delete action lines and confirm removal from projects.
Confirm action lines are fully removed and orphaned links do not remain.

title: Real-time Dashboard Metrics and Auto-refresh
description: Validate that the dashboard updates metrics, statistics, and visualizations in real-time with auto-refresh every 2 minutes.

steps.description: Login and open dashboard as any user.
Verify all real-time metrics and graphs display correctly.
Simulate updates to projects or products that affect dashboard metrics.
Ensure changes are reflected on dashboard after 2-minute auto-refresh.
Inspect at least 6 alert notifications are active, matching system criteria.
Validate alerts trigger correctly and notify users in real time.

title: Multi-criterion Scoring and AI-Based Recommendations
description: Test automatic scoring of projects and products based on multi-criteria and validate AI generated recommendations for evaluation and improvement.

steps.description: Create or update projects/products with diverse attributes affecting scoring.
Verify scoring calculations reflect expected values per criteria.
Invoke automated evaluation and fetch AI-based recommendations.
Confirm recommendations are generated correctly and relevant to the input data.
Test trigger of alerts based on scoring thresholds.
Ensure alerts activate proactively and notify appropriate users without errors.

title: Advanced Search Filtering for Projects, Products and Users
description: Validate the advanced search functionality with various filters including categories, status, roles, and keywords returns precise and performant results.

steps.description: Perform searches using different filter combinations on projects, products, and users.
Verify results match filter criteria exactly and no irrelevant items appear.
Test searches with empty or invalid filter values.
Confirm system handles gracefully and returns expected fallback results or empty sets.
Measure response time for search queries.
Validate queries return results within acceptable latency limits.

title: API REST Endpoints Security and Functionality
description: Ensure all REST API endpoints for user, project, product, line of action, and file management are secured, functional, and return appropriate status codes and data.

steps.description: Attempt accessing all API endpoints without authentication.
Verify access is denied with 401 Unauthorized for protected endpoints.
Access endpoints with JWT tokens of each role and exercise permitted operations.
Check correct HTTP status codes (200, 201, 403, 404) according to permissions and request validity.
Send malformed or invalid payloads to endpoints.
Confirm consistent and meaningful error responses with proper validation messages.

title: Dashboard Visualization and Reporting Interactive Features
description: Test that the dashboard analytics canvases, graphs, and reports are fully interactive, correctly displaying metrics and allow detailed drill-downs.

steps.description: Navigate to dashboard and interact with charts and graphs.
Verify elements respond dynamically (hover, click) and update displays accordingly.
Trigger filters and date range selectors.
Validate filtered reports refresh accurately without errors.
Export reports or snapshots if functionality exists.
Confirm export completes successfully with proper formatting.

title: System Availability and Cloud-native Deployment Stability
description: Verify that the system maintains high availability and stability using Cloudflare Workers, D1 (SQLite), and R2 Storage under load conditions.

steps.description: Simulate multiple concurrent users performing key operations across authentication, CRUD, dashboard access.
Observe no downtime or critical failures, response times meet SLA.
Perform data integrity checks under concurrent writes and updates.
Ensure no data loss or corruption occurs.
Monitor system logs and metrics for error rates or resource exhaustion.
Verify system operates within expected usage parameters and recovers gracefully from failures.
